original: intros. intros Hq Hdiv1 Hdiv2 Hpow. apply Nat.mul_cancel_l with (p := Nat.pow q x) (r := p1) (q := Nat.pow q y) in Hpow. - apply power_factor_uniq in Hpow; destruct Hpow as [Heq _]. apply Heq. - apply not_equiv_eq. intro abs. apply Hq. rewrite abs. apply Nat.mul_0_r. - intro abs. apply Hdiv1. rewrite abs. apply divides_0. - intro abs. apply Hdiv2. rewrite abs. apply divides_0.
